snippet: An article in Business Day yesterday about the deregulation of the electricity industry in California misidentified the utility marketing company that sought Union Bank of California as a customer. It was Energy Pacific, a joint venture of the Eno...
lead_paragraph: An article in Business Day yesterday about the deregulation of the electricity industry in California misidentified the utility marketing company that sought Union Bank of California as a customer. It was Energy Pacific, a joint venture of the Enova Corporation and Pacific Enterprises; it was not Edison Source.
abstract: Correction of Feb 25 article about deregulation of electric industry in California
